洯字的基本解释

洯
qiè
古水名。

洯
jié
古同“洁”。

洯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiè］
［《集韻》詰詰切，入屑，溪。］
水名。
[②]［jié］
［《集韻》吉屑切，入屑，見。］
同“潔1”。

洯字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洯； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页622第04
【集韻】詰結切，音挈。水名，出雍州南山。　又與潔同。詳潔字註。

洯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
洯字的起名意思

古同“洁”，有洁净，廉洁的意思，也可用作古水名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiè］
["Jiyun" cross-examination, cut into chips, stream. ]

[②]［jié］
["Ji Yun" Ji chips cut, enter the chips, see. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　洯; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 622 04
[Ji Yun] Cross-examination knot cut, sound 挈. The name of the water is from Nanshan in Yongzhou.　The same with Jie again. Detailed clean word note.

Name meaning
In ancient times, "Jie" means clean and incorruptible, and it can also be used as an ancient water name.
qiè
(1) 同"锲", 刻 carve
(2) 割 cut
